<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Pounce](/Feats.aspx?ID=6399) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261), [Verduran Shadow](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=312) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394)

**Requirements**
You are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) from or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96) by all of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any enemy.

</column>

---

You leap from the shadows to strike at your foes. [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to your Speed, then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) twice. If you were hidden or [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=98) by the target of these Strikes, the target is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against both attacks. Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.
